poem:
"General's Stand"

Above fields of sunflowers, shadows gather,
In the silent echo of martial ire.
Disagreements in heated whispers, simmer.
A general stands, unwilling to retire.

Under the weight of political discourse,
Ukraine's suitor in martial attire.
In the heart of turmoil, stands a force,
The General unyielding, tension caught on wire.
